ob-desc: Permitte que le wiki deveni un emissor de insignias [http://openbadges.org/ Open Badges]
ob-create-wrong-mime: Le imagine ha un formato incorrecte. Solmente PNG o SVG es permittite.
ob-create-name-exists: Le nomine del insignia jam existe.
badge-issue-legend: Emitter un insignia a un usator
ob-db-user-no-email: Le {{GENDER:$1|usator}} non ha fornite un adresse de e-mail.
ob-db-user-no-email-confirmation: Le usator non ha confirmate {{GENDER:$1|su}} adresse de e-mail.
ob-db-evidence-not-url: Le evidentia debe esser un adresse URL.
ob-db-unknown-error: Error incognite del base de datos.
ob-db-error-issued: Le insignia ha jam essite emittite a iste usator.
apihelp-openbadges-description: Obtener le assertion albergate de un insignia Open Badge.
apihelp-openbadges-summary: Obtener le assertion albergate de un insignia Open Badge.
apihelp-openbadges-param-obl_receiver: ID de usator del persona qui ha recipite le insignia Open Badge.
apihelp-openbadgesissue-description: Emitter un insignia Open Badge a un usator.
apihelp-openbadgesissue-summary: Emitter un insignia Open Badge a un usator.
apihelp-openbadgesissue-param-obl_badge_: Le insignia Open Badge a emitter desde {{SITENAME}}.
apihelp-openbadgesissue-param-obl_receiv: Nomine de usator del persona qui recipera le insignia Open Badge.
apihelp-openbadgesissue-param-obl_eviden: Le adresse URL verso le evidentia pro un usator que satisface le criterios de Open Badge.
apierror-openbadges-imageerror: Typo de file non valide pro le insignia
apierror-openbadges-inputerror-nobadgeid: Nulle insignia trovate pro iste ID
apierror-openbadges-noemail: Le destinatario del insignia non ha fornite su adresse de e-mail
apierror-openbadges-noemailconfirmed: Le destinatario del insignia non ha confirmate su adresse de e-mail
apierror-openbadges-noobl_badge_id: obl_badge_id parameter debe esser definite pro tote le typos excepte illo del emissor
apierror-openbadges-noobl_receiver: Le parametro obl_receiver debe esser definite pro un assertion de typo
apierror-openbadges-inputerror-noasserti: Nulle assertion de insignia trovate pro iste insignia e usator
apierror-openbadges-inputerror-norecipie: Non poteva trovar un destinatario con iste ID
apierror-openbadges-notloggedin: Usatores anonyme non pote emitter insignias
apierror-openbadges-notissuebadgeright: Le derecto 'issuebadge' es necessari pro emitter insignias
apierror-openbadges-badevidence: Le evidentia debe esser vacue o un adresse URL
